summary: Morgan le Fay is a magical and mysterious character from the legend of King Arthur. She is often portrayed as Arthur's sister, a powerful enchantress with a dual nature, capable of both good and evil. In early stories, she is a healer and protector, but later becomes more complex and sometimes an antagonist. Morgan's origins might be linked to Welsh mythology and ancient myths. She is associated with the magical Isle of Apples (Avalon) and has various names and roles in different tales. In modern times, she continues to capture imaginations, often merged with the character of Mordred's mother.
title: Morgan le Fay
